title: Linkman V7.3.0.1
description:
Linkman V7.3.0.1

 <a href="
http://www.outertech.com/index.php?_charisma_page=product&id=5" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.outertech.com/index.php?_charisma_page=product&id=5</a>


Linkman is a complete bookmark management solution to store, organize, annotate and check your favorite Internet pages. 
Linkman efficiently handles up to millions of URLs by using a database to store your links. It can call upon many powerful facilities that 
replace the browser&#039;s native URL management systems. You can easily add links from all browser windows and let retrieve keywords and 
descriptions automatically. The user interface is highly customizable. You get the capability to import and synchronize from existing 
bookmark collections and export bookmarks in a variety of formats. You can even build your own Export Templates. Several Template examples 
like XML and HTML output are included. Linkman supports multiple versions of ten different Windows browsers.


New in version 7.30 
Internet Explorer 8 and Firefox 3 support 

Installer option to install Linkman on a removable drive (e.g. USB stick) 

Firefox import/export preserves RSS feed and Icon information 

URL Validation can retrieve custom metatags 

Resizable URL Edit area in the main window 

File locations of Export Templates, Daily and Fast Links can be changed in the GUI 

"Move to" dialog (Main menu, Shortcut menu, URL properties dialog) 

Several smaller improvements and bug fixes
